_header: Alas mercy where shall mine heart you find
Subjects: Molins, Anne; love lyrics; roundels; acrostics
Bibliographic Ghosts:
Grenoble, Bibl. municipale, Grenoble 873: no English poems in this MS: see Arn (1994)
XArn, Mary-Jo. Fortunes Stabilnes: Charles of Orleans’s English Book of Love. A Critical Edition. Binghamton, NY: Medieval and Renaissance Texts and Studies, 1994, 382, n. 4.
_description: A roundel (an acrostic on Anne Molins) by Charles d’Orléans — twelve lines

BNfr25458.First Lines:
[A]las mercy wher shal myn hert yow fyndNeuer had he wyth yow ful
                    aqwaintans…
BNfr25458.Last Lines:
…Noght is the help that whyl not hym avansSlauth hys to me and
                    euer com be hyndeAlas mercy &c
